arts.ttl: Official: Real Madrid starting lineup against Liverpool | UEFA Champions League
arts.sum: Real Madrid will play one of their toughest fixtures of the season so far tonight when they take on Liverpool at Anfield in the UEFA Champions League. The Merengues have been very solid so far under Xabi Alonso, losing just one match in all competitions, and will be gunning to extend that run tonight. arts.ttl: Liverpool captain never considered Real Madrid transfer last summer despite rumours
arts.sum: As Liverpool get set to take on Real Madrid later tonight at Anfield, reports in Spain earlier today claimed that the Reds’ captain, Virgil van Dijk, was eager to join Real Madrid last summer.
